titleStmt.title: SII 5.252: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 252. (A.R. No. 576 of 1893). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . pārtdhiva saṃvatsarattu makara nāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu ṣaṣṭhi yum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttiraṭṭāti nāḷ tirumurukaṉpūṇṭi Āḷuṭaiya nāyaṉārkkup pāṇṭimaṇṭalattuc ceḻuvaṉūruṭaiyāṉ trivikramaṉ kaṇṇappaṉāṉa teṉṉavataraiyaṉeṉ
Iṉnāyaṉarkku Eṉ perāl nāṉ kaṭṭiṉa cantikku Amutupaṭikku nāḷ Oṉṟukku Arici kuṟuṇi nā ṉāḻiyāka Āṇṭoṉṟukku Arici � tana �dhama6 10 2 m paṭi veñcaṉattukkup paruppu Amutukku nāḷ Oṉṟukkup payaṟu nāḻikku I5�vī- Āka Āṇṭoṉṟukku I 5 � m
Āka I rā9 100 � ṅam kaṟiamutukku nāḷ Oṉṟukkup palam 4- Āka Āṇṭoṉṟukku palam 1000 4 100 4 kku nirvilaivilaippaṭi ṭṭa � m nāḷ Oṉṟu yum Oṉṟu Āṇṭoṉṟukku Uppu taṅa5 � ḷuka �viṉ vilaippaṭi ṭṭa 5 m nāḷ Oṉ ṟukku miḷaku Amutu � Āka Āṇṭoṉṟukku miḷaku�6
� kku nirvilai vilaippaṭi ṭṭa 7 I Āka ṭṭa 3 10- m Inta Amutupaṭikkum paruppu Amutukkum I � kku tirumurukaṉpūṇṭiyil ṭi yāṉaḷakka vāṭkaikku poti 4 ṉāl I 4 100 kku 3 Āka ṭṭa 9 10 kku palavilaiyum nirviṭṭa ca�ku I � vilaippaṭi I � m Āka 3 10 kkum
I6n� ṅa kku I n 6 10� kku nāṉ koṇṭu viṭṭa karaivaḻināṭṭuk kāṇānilattuc caṭarkaḷpaṟṟu Eṉṟu per kūvappaṭṭa ṉāl vitai � Inta vitai patiṉaiṅkalattukkum Aṉaittu Upātiyum Uṭpaṭa vitai � kku 2 Āka ṭṭa 3 10 m I 10 � Āka I �
� Āka Inta paṇam muppatukkum nellu nūṟṟu Aṟupattaiṅkalattukkum Inta vitai patiṉaiṅkalamum Intak koyilil ka n tevatāṉamāka Āṇṭuto ṟum cantrā tittavaraiyum ta ceytu koṇṭu Intappaṇamum pāṭṭane
llum śrīpaṇṭārattile celavākki nāṉ kaṭṭina canti muṭṭāmal Amutu ceyvittup potakkaṭavārkaḷāka nāṉāḻiyum paṉmāheśva rar per Aiñcukkum per Oṉṟukkuc coṟu nāḻi Ākac coṟu Aiññāḻiyum Eṉ perāl ceyta
tiruṉantavaṉattukku Intat tiruṉantavaṉañ ceytu tiruppaḷḷittāmam ppotukiṟa Āṇṭoṉṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukkuc coṟu Aiññā kkuc coṟu Iṟunāḻiyum Ākap per Eḻukkuc coṟu kuṟuṇi nāṉāḻiyum Ippaṭi Iṭṭup pokakkaṭavārkaḷākavum Ippaṭikku E
ṉ perāl kaṭṭiṉa canti cantrā tittavaraiyum muṭṭāmal naṭattip pokakaṭavārkaḷākavum Ippaṭikkuc cempilum cilaiyilum ve trivikra maṉ kaṇṇappaṉāṉa teṉṉavataraiyaṉeṉ Ippaṭikku Ivai teṉṉavataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu paṉmāheśvararakṣai(ḥ)
Digital edition of SII 5.252 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
